alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:02PM EDT until August 12 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL NEW CASTLE...SOUTHEASTERN CHESTER AND SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kennett Square, or near West Chester, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, West Chester, Westtown, Elsmere, Kennett Square, Newport, Arden, Cheyney, Talleyville, Elam, Chelsea, Ashland, Greenville, Concordville, Hockessin, Marshallton, Chester Township, West Goshen, Brookhaven and Chester Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 12 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
